item.title: [Paper] Tracktor
item.description: ï¸ï¸ï¸Tracking Without Bells and Whistles â­ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸â­ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸â­ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ | arXiv, GitHub The motivation of this paper is to directly use a standard detector, such as Faster R-CNN, and exploits its bounding box regression capabilities for tracking purpose. In effect they transform a detector into what’s they call a Tracktor. Notably, they don’t use tracking data. They reach state of the art performance and exceed them especially on difficulte situations (occlusions, etc.
